about.title: ABOUT US
about.text1: Since 2004, we've partnered with clients across the Americas to bring ambitious aquatic visions to life, combining precision engineering with real-world experience.
about.text2: Our team of specialists offers comprehensive technical solutions for aquatic projects, backed by internationally recognized certifications and 20+ years of field expertise. All our designs comply with both European and American standards to ensure safety, performance, and regulatory alignment.
about.text3: We work across various sectors, including hospitality, education, sports, and public infrastructure, delivering advanced design, 3D modeling, and certified component supply. Our methodology reduces errors, shortens construction timelines, and optimizes long-term performance.

howwework.title: HOW WE WORK
howwework.description: Every phase is structured to minimize risks, streamline construction, and optimize long-term system reliability.

steps.title: Initial Technical Assessment.
steps.description: We analyze critical project parameters (hydraulic, regulatory, structural, and functional) to define a realistic, safe, and budget-friendly technical solution from the start.

steps.title: Engineering Design & 3D Modeling.
steps.description: We create detailed technical documentation and 3D models to improve coordination, reduce conflicts, and enhance early decision-making.

steps.title: Equipment Supply & Technical Solutions
steps.description: We provide certified equipment that meets high standards for efficiency, durability, and compatibility.

steps.title: Comprehensive Technical Documentation
steps.description: We provide complete construction-ready plans, ensuring smooth installation and eliminating ambiguity.

steps.title: Technical Support During Execution
steps.description: We provide technical assistance at key moments of the installation process to ensure the correct interpretation of the design.
